full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 176 of 262 1887 LC8VMAX6 Rodgers - cross 1 cell phone, right? 2 A. Early '90s we did not. 3 Q. Before the days of cell phones. 4 A. Right. 5 Q. Because we're talking 20 years ago at this point, right? 6 A. Yeah, when we first were there, we had beepers. 7 Q. Okay. 8 A. And cell phones -- I'm guessing it was late '90s before we had cell phones. 9 10 Q. Right. So early '90s was before anybody really carried a cell phone as a matter of course? 11 12 A. Yeah. 13 Q. So you did have beepers though? 14 A. Yes. 15 Q. If there was a flight needed to be scheduled, typically you and Larry Viski would get a page on your beeper, right? 16 17 A. Correct. 18 Q. You would call back Epstein's office usually, right? 19 A. Yes. 20 Q. Because more often than not, that's where the call was coming from? 21 22 A. Right. 23 Q. And you would speak to Epstein's secretary or his assistant about the flight, right? 24 25 A. Correct. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013454
